Question
========

Variables X and Y were measured in 50 individuals. The results were put into a scatterplot accompanied by the regression line of Y on X.\ The equation of the regression line is equal to:

![](uva-equation-1221-nl-graph01.png)

Answerlist
----------

* Y = 2 + 1.4 * X
* X = 2 + 1.2 * Y
* X = 3 + 1.4 * Y
* Y = 3 + 1.2 * X

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Y = 2 + 1.4 * X: Incorrect
* X = 2 + 1.2 Y: Incorrect
* X = 3 + 1.4 * Y: Incorrect
* Y = 3 + 1.2 * X: Correct
